tool_description: Here you will get a funny sentence when you get request it!
title: Funny Sentences

api_list.name: getrequest
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://funny-sentences.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "funny-sentences.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
